summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein authorizing Harry Beller to have signing authority on an account associated with NES LLC at Deutsche Bank. The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby and indicates a formal request for banking authorization.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual authorizing signing authority for the account associated with NES LLC.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is granted signing authority on the account by Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the letter from Jeffrey Epstein regarding the signing authority.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Harry Beller to have signing authority on his account.
Jeffrey Epstein communicates with Amanda Kirby regarding banking matters.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein authorized Harry Beller to have signing authority on the NES LLC account.
The letter was addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
